languages.text: {n}Мастер вокса передает приказ техножрецам, и вскоре получает отчет:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: осколки обшивки принадлежат ксенорасе друкари, однако присутствие их кораблей в системе на данный момент подтвердить не удалось".

{n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер вокса передает приказ техножрецам, и вскоре получает отчет:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: осколки обшивки принадлежат ксенорасе друкари, однако присутствие их кораблей в системе на данный момент подтвердить не удалось".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Vox Master relays the order to the tech-priests and promptly receives a reply:{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

{n}The Vox Master relays the order to the tech-priests and promptly receives a reply:{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

{n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

{n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

{n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

languages.text: {n}音阵大师将命令传递给了技术神甫，随后很快收到了回复。{/n}“舰长大人，那些飞船的碎片属于黑暗灵族的飞船，但我们尚未确定他们的飞船目前是否还在这个星系。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵大师将命令传递给了技术祭司，随后很快收到了回复。{/n}“舰长大人，那些飞船的碎片属于黑暗灵族的飞船，但我们尚未确定他们的飞船目前是否还在这个星系。”

languages.text: {n}La maîtresse-vox transmet votre ordre aux technoprêtres et ne tarde pas à recevoir une réponse.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les fragments de coque appartiennent à la race xénos des Drukharis, mais la présence de leurs vaisseaux dans le système n'a pas été confirmée à l'heure actuelle. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maîtresse-vox transmet votre ordre aux technoprêtres et ne tarde pas à recevoir une réponse.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les fragments de coque appartiennent à la race xénos des Drukharis, mais la présence de leurs vaisseaux dans le système n'a pas été confirmée à l'heure actuelle. »

languages.text: {n}Die Voxmeisterin übergibt den Befehl an die Techpriester und bekommt umgehend eine Antwort.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich melde, dass die Hüllenteile von der Xenos-Rasse der Drukhari stammen, aber derzeit können wir in diesem System keine Anwesenheit ihrer Schiffe bestätigen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Voxmeisterin übergibt den Befehl an die Techpriester und bekommt umgehend eine Antwort.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich melde, dass die Hüllenteile von der Xenos-Rasse der Drukhari stammen, aber derzeit können wir in diesem System keine Anwesenheit ihrer Schiffe bestätigen.

languages.text: {n}La maestra de vocos transmite la orden a los tecnosacerdotes y recibe una respuesta a los pocos minutos.{/n} «Lord Capitán, me informan de que los fragmentos del casco pertenecen a la raza Drukhari de los xenos, pero no se ha podido confirmar la presencia de sus naves en este sistema».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de vocos transmite la orden a los tecnosacerdotes y recibe una respuesta a los pocos minutos.{/n} «Lord Capitán, me informan de que los fragmentos del casco pertenecen a la raza Drukhari de los xenos, pero no se ha podido confirmar la presencia de sus naves en este sistema».

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス・マスターが技術司祭に命令を伝えると、すぐに返答が返ってきた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、船体の破片は異種族のデュカーリのものではありますが、現時点では星系において彼らの船の存在は確認されていません」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス・マスターが技術司祭に命令を伝えると、すぐに返答が返ってきた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、船体の破片は異種族のデュカーリのものではありますが、現時点では星系において彼らの船の存在は確認されていません」

languages.text: {n}Voks Üstadı, verdiğin emri Tekno Rahiplere iletip çabuk bir yanıt alıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, gövde parçalarının zeno ırkına mensup Drukharilere ait olduğunu bildiriyorum. Fakat gemilerin an itibarıyla sistemde bulunup bulunmadığını bilmiyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vox Master relays the order to the Tech-Priests and promptly receives a reply.{/n} "Lord Captain, I am reporting that the hull fragments belong to the Drukhari xenos race, but the presence of their ships in the system at this time has not been confirmed."
